content:
On the DevDays Schedule Page for June 17, in Ask Lloyd McKenzie Anything (Office Hours) he lists possible topics ... note the last one:

  • Questionnaires and Structured Data Capture
  • FHIR Workflow and architecture
  • Getting involved in the FHIR community
  • Patient Empowerment work group (though happy for someone else to take that one if they're willing)

:-)

All y'all, I'm lookin' at you! It's virtual so all you'd need to do is be ready to get moderator-picked.
I can't believe they copied that into the description... :D

Not the first time such a thing has happened in the world!

Maybe you can deflect it by having one slide listing our four priorities and Abigailâ€™s email :-)
One of my primary roles in the community is passing people off to those more likely to have the answers. I know where I'll send the tough questions... ;)
You are a humble man :) Sounds like this is a signal for those of us attending to crash his session!
